title: Inscription recording restoration of a nymphaeum

handNote.lettering:
The form of the letter P is distinctive (found also in the letter of
                                    Iulius Paternus, ISic000308) with a horizontal stroke at the base.

provenanceFound._: Found in May 1771 in excavations undertaken by the Principe di Biscari on the northern side of Piazza Dante and the church of S. Nicolò
